subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ryan Palmer went from anxious to overwhelmed in a matter of seconds when his chip hit the pin and left him a tap-in for birdie and a one-shot victory over Robert Allenby in the Sony Open in Honolulu.
snippet: Ryan Palmer went from anxious to overwhelmed in a matter of seconds when his chip hit the pin and left him a tap-in for birdie and a one-shot victory over Robert Allenby in the Sony Open in Honolulu.
